Description:
Earthy Log Cabin Charmer
Set in a quiet location, walking distance to the beach is this fantastic 3 bedroom log cabin residence. With high ceilings, exposed timber beams and timber lining, this home offers earthy character, and loads of charm. The open plan living area, and generous kitchen is the ideal spot for the family to gather.
While the 3 bedrooms (two offering built in robes) a good sized family bathroom with walk in
shower, and a bath, separate toilet and laundry are practically positioned to the rear of the home.
Split system heating and cooling has been installed to provide year round comfort.
Outside, a single carport, open car spaces, water tank and garden shed making the most of this 618sqm approx. allotment. Situated within 5 mins drive of the township of Cowes, this home could suit many potential buyers, including investors, people searching for a great holiday home, or could appeal to those looking for permanent living.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 67 Hobsons Parade, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Located in the popular Seagrove Estate and backing onto the walking track that offers direct access to the beach is this vacant titled allotment set within 793sqm (approx.).
This parcel of land is within reach of the town centre and has the potential for bay views from a double storey dwelling.
The Seagrove Estate features an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water and are part of the National Broadband Network.

Description:
Home for the holidays
Located in in a central location only a short stroll to the main street and to Cowes north facing beaches - this tightly held pocket of Cowes is well sought after and a brilliant location for either holiday or permanent residence.
The property features five good sized bedrooms, two spacious bathrooms and two fantastic living zones, perfect for two families to enjoy. The open plan kitchen dining area is on the second level and has a stunning North facing aspect with large windows to soak up the sun, perfect for those cold winter nights.
There is a single lock up garage and plenty of secure parking at the front and a secure backyard for your furry friends. Leave your car at home and simply walk everywhere!
Insights: 5 Yarramundi Way, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
RESERVE AT YOUR BACK DOOR COWES CENTRAL
FEATURES --- DOUBLE REMOTE GARAGE, 2 LIVING AREAS, WOOD HEATER, SPLIT SYSTEM – 1.5 KILO WATT SOLAR SYSTEM.
This large 4 bedroom home, with living 2 areas is located in the Cowes central location and within walking distance to the beach, shops, schools and local health hub. Your new home offers a large open living plan and central kitchen with a separate dining area. The second living area is a great games room, hobby room or teenage entertainment area. The large master bedroom with full ensuite facilities can easily be used as a 3rd living area overlooking the park at your backyard. A 1.5 Kilo Watt solar system is an added value to this property to help you lower your power bills.
A unique aspect of the property is the central location and direct access to the park at the rear of your new property giving you wide open spaces. The large double remote control garage with concrete and power gives you plenty of room for secure storage and a great work shop at the end.
All this on a large child and pet friendly yard of Approx. 720m2

Description:
Central Cowes, Perfect for Investors
Looking for a Cowes property in a great central location, close to shops and the beach? This could be the one you have been waiting for!
Situated on a great sized 650sqm approx allotment, on a quite street with established trees, and low maintenance gardens, this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick home would be ideal for holiday, permanent living or as an attractive investment opportunity.
For investors, the home has a near new hot water service, split system heating and cooling, and has been successfully rented out to long term tenants for the current vendors. Being brick, and solidly built - very little ongoing maintenance would be required.
Holiday home owners will love this location, within walking distance from the north facing Cowes beach, shops, cafe's and supermarkets. Plenty of room for the car, caravan, boat or visitors!
Potential as a permanent residence, offers convenience, being close to amenities, schools, sporting facilities and public transport.
This one is worth a look! Arrange an inspection today by phoning Bec on 0402 211 823 or Simon on 0448 440 690.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Brand new townhouse in central location
This brand new three bedroom townhouses is in a fantastic location in Cowes, only a short stroll to the main street, offering medical facilities, shops and schools as well as being a close stroll to our beautiful North facing beaches.
Offering three bedrooms, open plan living/ kitchen with island bench, single bathroom with separate toilet, laundry and entertainment deck, and single carport.
The design is modern and includes split system air conditioning, vinyl timber flooring in the living area and carpeted bedrooms. All you need to do is move in and start enjoying your new life in Phillip Island. Alternatively, it would make an ideal investment property.
Be quick! Only 1 left!

Description:
Titled Vacant Land - Build The Coastal Dream!
Get ready to build your new dream home on this rare titled 639sqm approx. parcel of coastal land, in an established area of Cowes, that will give you the peaceful surroundings and the lifestyle you have always longed for.
Only a few minutes walk to the Thompson Ave shops giving you access to restaurants, cafes, bars and supermarkets and Blue Gum Reserve only minutes walk away. The local seaside environment will surely impress.
For the young families there is the choice of 2 local primary schools and Phillip Island Early Learning Centre within close proximity.
Enjoy all that Phillip Island has to offer, everything is right at your doorstep so don't delay in securing your own slice of heaven.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Corner allotment in the stunning Seagrove estate
This soon to be titled block of land is located in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 514 square metre (approx.) corner allotment is due to title at the end of 2019.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:
Coastal Country Charm With A Touch Of Contemporary!
Set in the popular pocket of Red Rocks beach in Cowes, is this well presented coastal country weatherboard home which is blessed with fabulous natural light.
An outstanding floor plan that awaits its new owners and will entice any large family with its size, space and extra features. Sitting proudly on a fully fenced 603sqm approx and has been built to allow for a variety of family set ups.
There are 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 separate living zones allowing each and every family member to have their own peace and privacy whilst the stunning kitchen is the centre-piece for everyday family life.
Outdoor living has been added for entertaining on a grand scale with a spacious undercover alfresco area perfect for all weather occasions, and an above ground solar heated pool is perfectly placed for family enjoyment. There is also plenty of room for the caravan or boat, and a secure double garage and garden shed at the rear.
Within walking distance to famous Red Rocks prestige's north facing Beach and a short drive into town, you are not far from the convenience of being in the heart of Cowes.
This is an excellent opportunity to secure one of Phillip Island finest properties, you will will be delighted by character features and modern accents throughout this immaculate home.
Inspection will not disappoint!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Superbly built home - offers invited.
Located in a peaceful cul-de-sac in Cowes, overlooking farmland with distant bay views. This single level, four bedroom home is ideally located within walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and a 600 metre walk to North facing bay beaches. This superbly built home is ideal for entertaining friends and family with its fabulous north-facing deck and low maintenance, landscaped gardens. Featuring large master bedroom with large windows to take in the lovely view, walk in robe and ensuite with spa bath and separate shower, a further two bedrooms with built in robes, as well as a fourth study/bedroom with access to the massive two car garage, comfortable and spacious living room, separate formal dining area with timber floors and a modern entertainers kitchen with granite benchtops, breakfast bar, large pantry with a second tiled dining/ living area. Other features include large laundry with separate toilet, huge double garage with remote door, ducted heating and cooling, ducted vacuum, updated premium LED lighting has been installed throughout the whole house, high-quality skylights have been added as well. vegetable patch and garden shed.
Located in an established estate, this house was built by a very well renowned Masterbuilder for himself and no expenses were spared in building a very high-quality home. Only a short stroll to parkland and playgrounds. Currently running as a successful holiday rental, it is in an ideal location for a family home, weekend getaway or investment property. Inspection will not disappoint.

Description:
Look No Further, This Is It!!
Stunning beach style residence combines seamlessly with a stylish update. Central Cowes is one of the most sought after locations on Phillip Island and this home is within short walking distance to the Thompson Avenue's cafe culture and all Cowes has to offer. With only 700m approx to pristine Cowes North facing Beach.
This well loved family holiday home comprising a open plan kitchen/dining/living area which has been stylishly renovated; three bedrooms and renovated main bathroom.
Additional features include; a north facing decking area that overlooks the front garden with plenty of room for off street parking. Other great features include timber floors, split system heating and cooling and undercover entertaining deck. Making this home ideal for permanent or holiday living.
All set within a 663m2 approx allotment with low maintenance surround and plenty of room for the boat/caravan.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Fabulously Furnished!
On offer is this delightful fully furnished three bedroom home providing a fantastic opportunity for permanent living, holiday makers and investors alike. The home features light filled rooms, plenty of entertainment options and lovely low maintenance surrounds.
Your new island home comprises three bedrooms, all with built in robes, and a family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. The open plan kitchen, living and dining space includes a fantastic kitchen with plenty of bench space, electric stove and cooktop and bar style seating. You'll be ready for any season with split system heating and cooling, ceiling fan and a wood fire heater.
Get ready to entertain family and friends with an amazing huge covered outdoor entertaining area which can be used year round. A lovely east facing balcony provides further outdoor entertaining space.
The home is on a great size allotment of approx 627 square metres (approx) and is fully fenced with a lovely, spacious backyard with established gardens and plenty of room for parking a boat or caravan. The property is situated only minutes to beautiful Red Rocks Beach and the Cowes shopping precinct.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
BLUE CHIP LOCATION
Away from the madding crowd yet only a 10-minute stroll to Cowes main shopping strip, and with the primary school just around the corner. This immaculately presented brick home boasts 3 living zones, 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with a ensuite and walk in robe.
Its all for the largest of families. Upon entering the foyer which has access garage access, it then leads you into the lounge area with views to the north facing courtyard and charming garden.
The central kitchen, Hub of the home" is light, bright and modern overlooking the dining area and family relaxation zone. Opening from this area is a games /theatre room with access to the courtyard and rear landscaped gardens. Complete with a shedding and a potting area for the plant lover, plus an additional undercover barbeque area. This property has quality floor coverings, fixtures and fittings throughout and two split systems
Access to the rear garden through garage roller door. This property is secluded and fully fenced.
Perfectly positioned with many more features that would impress the buyer.
Call Sharon on 0405 575 332
1st Choice is open 7 days a week.

Description:
PRIME LOCATION ACROSS FROM THE PARK - BUY, BUILD, OR BUILT
Welcome to the Seagrove estate just 700m from the beautiful Cowes beach, and a short drive to Cowes main street.
This land of approximately 453m2 is in one of the best locations that Seagrove has to offer.
This property has a beautiful house that has been architecturally designed to allow spacious low maintenance living. This property will be ideal for your holiday or permanent home.
These permits and plans have all been approved and ready to build. A rare option here to purchase in 3 different ways be it land, plans, or full completed house.
In a first for Phillip Island, Seagrove features an underground reticulated LPG network. As well as offering greater convenience, reticulated gas also provides homeowners with savings of over 40% on their gas consumption compared with purchasing LPG in cylinders.
Additionally Seagrove offers a connection to the NBN providing superfast fibre based broadband services and also Recycled water.
This allotment is due to title early 2019. Call Alex Scott Cowes on 5952 2633 to discuss purchasing this allotment or build this beautiful home.

Description:
TOO GOOD TO MISS!
This renovated, two bedroom unit offers the ultimate in low maintenance living, in a fantastic central location. All that Cowes has to offer is within easy walking distance. Only a few minutes' walk to the beach and only a five minute walk to the main shopping strip, with it's restaurants, cafes, and supermarkets.
Situated in a group of units, there is a communal swimming pool and BBQ area offering a great area to entertain and socialise, or if you prefer some privacy, there is a courtyard at the rear of the unit, offering a great space for relaxing with a good book.
The unit itself is low maintenance and functional in design, with timber veneer flooring, ceiling fans, great open plan living and kitchen with electric cooking. Being offered fully furnished, this unit is ready for you to enjoy.
The opportunity to own a unit in this great, central location, doesn't come around often, so call our office now, to arrange your inspection.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION, CLOSE TO THE BEACH
This charming, double storey townhouse is tucked away in a quiet tree-lined court just a few steps from one of the island's loveliest northern beaches and only a short walk from the centre of Cowes.
A leafy cottage garden leads you to the front porch which opens into a wide entry hall. To the right is a spacious bathroom-laundry while to the left is a bright kitchen with garden outlook and plenty of cupboard space. Next is the master bedroom with a tranquil, private courtyard outlook. The hallway opens into an airy, light-filled dining and living area with timber beams and a cathedral ceiling. Glass doors open onto a terracotta-tiled patio in a tastefully landscaped and decorated courtyard, so inviting for al fresco entertaining or simply relaxing in the sun.
Back inside, polished wooden stairs take you up to a study/sitting area and two additional bedrooms with huge built in robes. An upper level sundeck offers views across tree tops to the foreshore reserve with glimpses of the bay - perfect for sunset drinks.
New sunblinds, new reverse cycle heating/cooling throughout and traditional wide eaves ensure year round comfort. There is secure off street parking for two vehicles. Shops, cafes and restaurants are all within easy walking distance. The nearby bay beach is safe for year round swimming and lovely beach walks beckon: west to Red Rocks and Ventnor, east to Silverleaves and the Rhyll inlet.
This unique, secluded, comfortable home offers coastal living at its best. Perfect for either permanent or holiday living, this townhouse is reasonably priced and will sell quickly. Call our office now to arrange your private inspection.
Insights: 4/220 CHURCH STREET, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Walk to the beach !!!!
A place for weeks on end or just the weekends !
Imagine walking literally 2 minutes to the beach for an afternoons swimming, sunbathing or even some beach cricket, then being able to stroll home in a few minutes for a BBQ on the full length deck and entertaining area.
Set in a wonderfully quiet pocket of Cowes, far enough from the hustle and bustle of town, but close enough to walk within 1/2 hour or drive in just a few minutes.
Beautifully presented home with 2 separate living zones, separated by the modern kitchen with a view over the private low maintenance garden, 3 generous sized bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms.
Originally designed as a 4 bedroom, with the addition of 1 wall you could even create a 4th bedroom. (see floor plan)
Set on a flat block with a native garden, designed for low maintenance living and extended times away.
A huge double driveway, enough to fit 4 cars off the street, then a massive double carport with enough height to fit most boats and large caravans.
With a driveway this large, reversing anything in will be a breeze.
But best of all, whether you spend weeks on end or just weekends, this property offers the best of coastal living within a stones throw to the beach.
Enquire today to be the first to inspect.
